channel.title: Politcs on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Politcs on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: John Oliver Mocks Trump’s Stroll Atop White House Roof: “The President Just Fully Snoopied on National TV”
item.description: “That may actually be a perfect encapsulation of Trump’s presidency: A bunch of people yelling, ‘What the f*** are you doing?’” the ‘Last Week Tonight’ host quipped after the president caught reporter

item.description: “That may actually be a perfect encapsulation of Trump’s presidency: A bunch of people yelling, ‘What the f*** are you doing?’” the ‘Last Week Tonight’ host quipped after the president caught reporter

item.title: Rosie O’Donnell Calls Trump a “Bad Joke” After He Threatens to Revoke Her U.S. Citizenship
item.description: “You lie, you steal, you degrade — I nurture, I create, I persist,” she wrote on Instagram. “You are everything that is wrong with America.”

item.title: Rosie O’Donnell Calls Trump a “Bad Joke” After He Threatens to Revoke Her U.S. Citizenship
item.description: “You lie, you steal, you degrade — I nurture, I create, I persist,” she wrote on Instagram. “You are everything that is wrong with America.”
